string-array.name: TOASTS
string-array.item: Hit the Back button again to exit
Device is not pluged to the phone
Couldn\'t able to establish a connection. Try again with proper permissions.
Unable to open the port. Detach, re-attach the device to fix the problem.
Unknown error. Detach, re-attach the device to fix the problem.
Your android device is not having OTG enabled.
Simulation not available: No model is available in this window simulate or the bridge is not connected.
You cannot exit to the Main menu while the simulation is running. Stop the simulation before proceeding to the main menu.
You cannot change settings while simulation is running.
This is not a valid integer number. Enter a number in the range
Please press any of the buttons to exit this window.
